title: Brand new, beautiful 1 bed - never lived in - luxurious
posting_body: Hey there, Jeff here with Rental Friends - - Denver's premier free apartment finding service.
I have some great deals in town right now - - including this one!
Beautiful Quartz counters, stainless appliances, workout facility, pool, dog was station, walking distance to lots of good bars and restaurants.
Get in touch and I'll email you info, links and pics of this and other properties available for your time frame and price range!
